mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SHOP_CART WHERE SCT_MEM_NO = #{sct_mem_no} ORDER BY SCT_NO DESC

SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_DISPRICE, PRO_MILEGE , CONCAT(CONCAT(FORMAT(PRO_DISPRICE, 0)),'원') AS PRO_CH_PRICE , CONCAT(CONCAT(FORMAT(PRO_MILEGE, 0)),'원') AS PRO_CH_MILEGE , PRO_PCL_NO , PRO_NAME , PMG_FILE , PCL_NAME , CONCAT(FORMAT(PRO_DISPRICE*#{sct_count}, 0),'원') AS PRO_TOT_CH_PRICE , PRO_DISPRICE*#{sct_count} AS PRO_TOT_PRICE , PRO_MILEGE*#{sct_count} AS PRO_TOT_MILEGE FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRO_IMG ON PRO_NO = PMG_PRO_NO JOIN PRO_CLASS ON PRO_PCL_NO = PCL_NO WHERE PRO_NO = #{sct_pro_no} AND PMG_IDT_NO = 1

SELECT CONCAT(FORMAT(#{sct_tot_disprice}, 0),'원') AS SCT_TOT_CH_DISPRICE , CONCAT(FORMAT(#{sct_tot_milege}, 0),'원') AS SCT_TOT_CH_MILEGE , #{sct_tot_disprice} AS SCT_TOT_DISPRICE , #{sct_tot_milege} AS SCT_TOT_MILEGE FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP_CART (SCT_NO, SCT_PRO_NO, SCT_COUNT, SCT_MEM_NO) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SCT_NO), 0)+1 FROM SHOP_CART a) , #{sct_pro_no}, #{sct_count}, #{sct_mem_no})
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_MIL , CONCAT(CONCAT(FORMAT(MEM_MIL, 0)),'원') MEM_CH_MIL FROM MEM_COM WHERE MEM_NO = #{sct_mem_no}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ODR_NO), CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%c%d'),'00000'))+1 FROM ORDERS WHERE ODR_NO LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%c%d'),'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE MEM_COM SET MEM_MIL = (MEM_MIL - #{useMileage}) WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no}
mapper.select: SELECT O.ODR_NO , M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_EMAIL , M.MEM_ADDR , M.MEM_TEL , M.MEM_HP , date_format(O.ODR_ODATE, '%Y-%c-%d') AS ODR_ODATE , D.DLV_ZONECODE , D.DLV_SENDADDR , D.DLV_SENDADDR2 , O.ODR_CONDITION , O.ODR_AMOUNT , O.ODR_MILEAGE , M.MEM_MIL , (CASE ODR_CONDITION WHEN 1 THEN '주문신청' WHEN 2 THEN '결제확인' WHEN 3 THEN '배송' WHEN 4 THEN '주문완료' END) as ODR_CONDITION2 FROM ORDERS O, MEM_COM M, DELIVERY D, ODR_DET OD WHERE M.MEM_NO=O.ODR_MEM_NO AND D.DLV_NO=OD.ODT_DLV_NO AND OD.ODT_ODR_NO = O.ODR_NO AND O.ODR_NO = #{odr_no} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT ODT_PRO_NO SCT_PRO_NO , ODT_COUNT SCT_COUNT , '1' AS SCT_PRO_PART FROM ODR_DET WHERE ODT_ODR_NO = #{odr_no}
